__e: Look at you. The fallen hero.
You thought the lady in danger. But you were mistaken!
She calls you the Sad Faced Knight.
So much so, that sometimes... I lie in bed... And I see your face, with those sad eyes of yours... and I can't sleep.
And she's standing there with these sad eyes like she's the victim.
You're gonna keep looking at me with those sad eyes until I go talk to her,aren't you?
